column2: website=[http://www.tolkiensociety.org/society/publications/amon-hen/ ''Amon Hen'' at the Tolkien Society website]

column1: '''''Amon Hen''''' is the bulletin of [[The Tolkien Society]]. Published bimonthly continually since [[1972]], ''Amon Hen'' contains  Tolkien-related news, reviews, articles, event details, artwork, letters, and features.

Notable contributors to ''Amon Hen'' have include: [[Christopher Tolkien]], [[Ted Nasmith]], [[Tom Shippey]], [[Wayne G. Hammond]], [[Christina Scull]], [[Roger Lancelyn Green]], [[John D. Rateliff]] and [[Brian Sibley]].
